abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor, has purchased a big stake in Anadarko Petroleum, according to regulatory filings, suggesting the billionaire investor is betting on further consolidation in the oil services sector. Icahn Management, one of Icahn’s investment vehicles, took a stake of about 3.1 million shares in Anadarko, worth about $133.5 million as of March 31, the filing said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor, has purchased a big stake in Anadarko Petroleum, according to regulatory filings, suggesting the billionaire investor is betting on further consolidation in the oil services sector. Icahn Management, one of Icahn’s investment vehicles, took a stake of about 3.1 million shares in Anadarko, worth about $133.5 million as of March 31, the filing said Tuesday.
